projects.name: Real-time Device Tracking System using Node, Express and Socket.io
projects.description:
* Utilized Socket.io for real-time data exchange, enhancing responsiveness and user interaction.
* Deployed Developed using Node.js, Express.js, and Socket.io to ensure instant updates and accurate location tracking, increasing performance efficiency by 30%.

projects.name: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description:
* Responsive Design: Designed and developed a personal portfolio website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, ensuring compatibility across various devices and screen sizes.
* Interactive Features: Employed JavaScript to create interactive elements, such as a contact form and smooth scrolling navigation, enhancing user experience by 25%.

projects.name: Attendance Management system using face-recognition
projects.description:
* Developed an Attendance Management System with Python and OpenCV, utilizing face recognition for automated, accurate attendance tracking, enhancing operational efficiency by 40% and data integrity by 35%.
* Built a user-friendly interface for real-time face recognition to track attendance efficiently and reliably.

experiences.description:
* Technical Immersion and Skill Development: Gained hands-on experience with Database Management Systems (DBMS), Python programming, Linux operating system, and Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA), significantly enhancing technical proficiency by 60%.
* Collaborated with mentors and team members, enhancing learning by 30%.

* Participated in regular meetings and code reviews to align development efforts with project goals and stakeholder expectations, increasing project alignment by 40%.
* Designed and implemented various payment gateway methods, including integration with Razorpay, facilitating secure and efficient payment processing, improving transaction speed by 35%.
* Utilized debugging tools and techniques to troubleshoot and resolve software defects, enhancing the overall stability and performance of the application by 50%.
